daftar:
Hi, you haven't registered yet. To use this feature, please register first. Type .register name.age
Example .name list 1999.24
limit:
*❗Your Limit Has Exceeded, You Cannot Use This Feature*
*To increase the limit, please type*
*.claim (for daily claims)*
*.hour (for hourly claims)*
*.claimkupon (to claim coupon)*
*.claimuang (to claim money)*
*.buylimit amount (to buy limit)*
*example .buylimit 10*
*Limit Will Be Given 20 Every Hour 23:00 Night*
banned:
❌ You Have Been Banned Cannot Use Bots
Please confirm with the owner
disable:
‍🐽 Feature Has Been Disabled By Owner
Chat Owner To Turn It On
Type .owner
OnlyGroup: ❗This command can only be used in groups
OnlyPM: ❗This command can only be used in private messages.
GrupAdmin: ❗This command can only be used by Group Admins.
OnlyOwner: ❗This command can only be used by the bot owner.
BotAdmin: ❗Make me admin to be able to use this command
premium: ❗This command is specifically for premium members, contact the owner
